name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale West / Pembroke Pines

reviews.text: First time to this H.I. And was pleasantly happy with the stay. The bed was comfortable and it was quiet. All H.I. Have free wifi and I chose to sit by the pool after a long flight and drive to just relax. I would stay here again on my next work trip.
reviews.title: Great Stay, Slept Great

reviews.text: The stay was excellent. The lobby, the sleeping rooms and the pool area were immaculate. The only problem was this Hampton did not offer free bottled water. I have received that amenity at other Hamptons.
reviews.title: Fabulous property

reviews.text: There was some problem with the water, so the hotel was generous enough to offer water but forgot to give me one. Later when I asked for some, I was told water is fine so I need to purchase one. Breakfast was great to have but don't expect to get full from it--need more choices. Air condition turns off when no one is in the room. Blast the air as soon as you walk in or you will be extremely hot. It takes awhile for it to kick in.
reviews.title: was okay

reviews.text: Needed to stay for a couple days after back surgery; motel more than meet my exceeded my expectations. Hotel quiet, beds excellent, staff attentive, breakfast good. If necessary to stay for hospital visit (Cleveland Clinic), will chose this motel. Proved to my wife and I why we choose Hampton or related brand on our travels.
reviews.title: Good Value and Excellent Staff

reviews.text: Amazing hotel. the breakfast was great. the staff was very friendly and helpful! also very clean and newly renovated. I will be coming back to this property when ever i need to visit this area. It is very close to I75.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: I am a loyal Honors member and was delighted by the professionallism hat was prevallant during our stay in Pembroke Pines, Fla. The setting is sensational and the people are ever so ! I can't wait to go back !
reviews.title: My Personal Best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night. The hotel is very clean, even the hallways smelled fresh. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was ample. They even had to-go bags for breakfast which was convenient for us as we were heading back to the airport. It is a good value an in a quiet area. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Very clean

reviews.text: Nice, easy and clean. Breakfast was on par with a Waffle House. Staff tears down food service area at EXACTLY 10:00 AM without warning. Staff is amazingly courteous and helpful. We would definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Vacation With Dad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As with every other Hampton Inn we have stayed at, we were entirely satisfied with the accommodations at the Pembroke Pines Hampton Inn. We were especially impressed with the extra charging stand on the bedside table (we travel with a laptop, an iPad and 2 smart phones) and the hottub by the lovely outdoor pool.
reviews.title: Pembroke Pines FL Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I enjoyed our stay here. It's in a quiet office park situated next to the freeway with many places to eat, shop and enjoy Florida nearby. It's a clean hotel with friendly staff and an amazing breakfast. I only had issue with the internet access which was painfully slow at times. I will definitely consider staying here again.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: I travel all over the world - I am in South Florida- I have tried many hotels - None beat this one for overall service - comfort and price - The staff are very helpful and the rooms are fantastic - the price is very reasonable and the location is perfec to acess all of south Florida
reviews.title: No better Hotel in South Florida

reviews.text: The Staff in this Hotel is excellent! The lobby is freshly remodeled. It is located right behind a Cracker Barrel, which is great to walk to for dinner. The bedding is soft, clean and the rooms are immaculate.
reviews.title: Hampton Pembroke Very Nice

reviews.text: My wife and I were visiting family in the area. We also had our 1 year old toddler with us. We chose this hotel because I've stayed at Hampton Inns in the past and always had a good experience. Also, we chose this hotel because they had a crib available. Was very happy with the hotel. It was clean. The staff was friendly, especially the general manager (Greg or Craig?) who took time to greet us.
reviews.title: Family friendly and clean!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel clearly shows that it has an excellent management that trains properly to its staff. All services (front desk, breakfast, maintenance and housekeeping) are performed beyond the normal for this type of convenient lodging. Well located.
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not have a good experience at this hotel.
reviews.title: My experience

reviews.text: Always looking forward to return to the hotel, rooms are always very clean and smell fresh. Maids and also Housekeeping Supervisors are very friendly and attent of our needs. Also the Front Desk Staff are friendly and makes us feel like home. Little disappointed about the service received by the breakfast attendant ( she never smile and seems not happy with the job). However, in overall a perfect hotel and staff like always. We will continue visiting the hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Service

reviews.text: Thanks for everything Christoball and thanks to your staff for all they have done.
reviews.title: Great Customer service

reviews.text: Mark and family
reviews.title: Excellent Service
Expensive but safe.
reviews.text: This hotel rates as very good rather than average because of the customer service. There is little in the vicinity in terms of places to eat and drink and I don't understand why the place doesn't have a bar and/or restaurant, so if it wasn't for assistance from the staff we would have struggled for somewhere to spend the evening in an unfamiliar location. The location is great for getting on/off the I 75. Breakfast was ok.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed for the first time at this hotel in February this year. After that I have stayed there five times for 15 nights and had the best experience. Laurence Abo and Sonja are among the best of the best in customer service and they compensate for any problems we may have as guests. Valerie Hoyos, their Sales Manager also is very encouraging of her staff and promotes excellent goodwill. All in all, if I am ever in that neck of the woods, there is nowhere else I would stay.
reviews.title: Great Place to Saty

aka: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale West / Pembroke Pines Hotel Pembroke Pines
description: We're conveniently located off I-75 and Sheridan Street East, between the Miramar and Weston Parks of Commerce. Our Free amenities include: Wireless High-Speed Internet, "On The House" Hot Breakfast, local calls, and parking. All rooms have been newly remodeled and offers coffeemaker, microwave, refrigerator, iron/ironing board, hairdryer, TV w/extended cable, and 2 phones w/voice mail. Outdoor pool, business center, fitness center, 24-hr convenience store, laundry/valet services, laundromat, and meeting facilities. King-whirlpool rooms are available.
